title: Crater Lake National Park: Monitoring Techniques
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Science & Research     Crater Lake Fish Monitoring     Monitoring Techniques                Techniques Used to Monitor Crater Lake Fish         Top panel shows the acoustic signature of the fish and the bottom of the lake.  The bottom panel shows the acoustic sampler used by Crater Lake. NPS  Acoustic Survey            View of a gill net in Crater Lake. NPS  Gill Net Sampling          Rainbow Trout from Crater Lake next to a measuring board.  Note the partially digested salamanders found in the trout's stomach. NPS  Weighing, Measuring, and Stomach Content Analysis
